tgt_original: rūpaskandhagatādarśo (51)  rūpaṃ ca paṃcamaṃ yāti  krodhamaitreyasaṃyutaṃ |
gandhaś ca paṃcamaṃ yāti  krodhadvayasamanvitaṃ |  saṃskārāḥ kṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ  māruto rasanendriyaṃ [ | ]  [ rasa ] ś ca pañcamaṃ yāti  krodhadvayasamanvitaṃ ||
vijñānaskandham āyāti  vijñānaṃ ca prabhāśva ( sic ) raṃ ||
